level.heading: DCPS CONTESTED RESIDENCY CASES – BEGINNING A CASE (ยง 1-2906)

level.text: DCPS shall refer a contested residency case to OAH by filing a copy of the request for review that it received, along with a statement that DCPS requests OAH to hear and to decide the case.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Notice of Emergency and Proposed Rulemaking published at 58 DCR 11122 (December 23, 2011)[EXPIRED]; as amended by Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 59 DCR 3128, 3131 (April 20, 2012).
